text: Money Mad is a 1908 American silent crime movie directed by D. W. GriffithMoney MadMoney Mad and stars Charles Inslee, George Gebhardt, and Arthur V. Johnson. ==Actors== * Charles Inslee - The Miser * George Gebhardt - Second Villain * Arthur V. Johnson - Bank Clerk * Florence Lawrence - Bank Customer / Landlady * Jeanie MacPherson - Bank Customer * Mack Sennett - Man on the Street * Harry Solter - First Villain ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 movies Category:1900s crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Money Mad (1908 movie)
